control.name: icbHighlightedItemStyle
control.description: This editor allows you to specify whether hot-tracked items are painted skinned or using the default system color.

control.name: cmbSeparatorChar
control.description: This editor allows you to specify the separator delimiting items in the edit box. The setting is not supported when displaying bit fields (flags).

control.name: teSelectAllItemCaption
control.description: This editor allows you to rename the '(Select All)' item used to select/unselect all items in the popup.

control.name: ceSelectAllItem
control.description: This editor allows you to control the visibility of the '(Select All)' item.

control.name: checkedComboBoxEdit1
control.description: The CheckedComboBoxEdit editor supports bit fields (flags). This editor displays a set of bit fields with a named zero value.

control.name: checkedComboBoxEdit2
control.description: The CheckedComboBoxEdit editor supports bit fields (flags). This editor displays a set of bit fields without a named zero value.

hint.name: checkedComboBoxEditSample
hint.hinttext: #KeyboardALT+DOWN, F4 to show or hide the dropdown listUP, DOWN keys to select the previous or next item#Mouse WheelSupported#Other End-User ActionsUse the controls on the right pane to learn which additional end-user customization methods are available
